gov.va.med.srcalc.web.controller.admin

Class EditVariableController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.va.med.srcalc.web.controller.admin.EditVariableController

  • @Controller
@RequestMapping(value="/admin/variables/{variableKey}")
public class EditVariableController
extends java.lang.Object
    Web MVC controller for editing existing variables.

      • createEditVar

        @ModelAttribute(value="variable")
public EditExistingVar createEditVar(@PathVariable
                                           java.lang.String variableKey)
                              throws InvalidIdentifierException
        Creates an EditExistingVar instance for the identified variable.
        Parameters:
        variableKey - the name of the variable to edit
        Returns:
        the EditExistingVar instance
        Throws:
        InvalidIdentifierException - if no such variable exists

      • displayForm

        @RequestMapping(method=GET)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView displayForm(@ModelAttribute(value="variable")
                                                                      EditExistingVar editVar)
        Presents a form to edit the specified variable.
        Parameters:
        editVar - the form-backing object

      • saveVariable

        @RequestMapping(method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView saveVariable(@ModelAttribute(value="variable")
                                                                       EditExistingVar editVar,
                                                                       org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
        Applies modification from the EditExistingVar, if valid, to the variable. If the EditExistingVar is invalid, presents the validation errors.
        Parameters:
        editVar - the form backing object representing the modifications to perform
        bindingResult - the BindingResult for the EditExistingVar
